item.title: Death toll from Texas flash floods rises to at least 82, officials say
item.description: Almost a dozen people from a children's summer camp in Kerr County remain missing, officials said.

item.title: Tropical depression Chantal flooding spurs North Carolina water rescues
item.description: Tropical depression Chantal brought flooding to North Carolina and spurred water rescues before moving over Virginia overnight Monday.

item.title: Mass shooting in Grays Ferry leaves 3 dead and 9 injured
item.description: A total of 13 people have been shot in Philadelphia's Grays Ferry neighborhood, leaving three people dead, police said.

item.title: U.S. deports men from Asia and Latin America to South Sudan after legal saga

item.title: In a nation growing hostile toward homelessness, L.A. tries harm reduction
item.description: A new care center for homeless people on Los Angeles' infamous Skid Row embraces the principle of harm reduction, a more lenient approach to drug use ...
